headline: Diamondback Energy, Halliburton, and VoltaGrid Sign Agreement for Four Electric Simul-Frac Fleets in the Permian Basin
summary: HOUSTON, Dec. 13, 2024 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Diamondback Energy (NYSE: FANG), Halliburton Energy Services (NYSE: HAL), and VoltaGrid LLC have entered into a landmark agreement to deploy four advanced electric simul-frac fleets across the Permian Basin. This collaboration represents a significant investment in clean and efficient energy solutions, with VoltaGrid delivering approximately 200 megawatts (MW) of electric power to support Diamondback Energy’s field operations. This marks a continuation

headline: OPEC's Oil Market Report: Insights and Projections for 2025
